text: The sample was stratified by age and gender but not by BMI or waist circumference. Thus, the baseline BMI and waist circumference was higher in the intervention group. Cost benefit was not assessed in this study and is an important endpoint to consider for future, larger trials.
sentences: The sample was stratified by age and gender but not by BMI or waist circumference.
Thus, the baseline BMI and waist circumference was higher in the intervention group.
Cost benefit was not assessed in this study and is an important endpoint to consider for future, larger trials.
